Special dev version, according to SCR 10393 from 25.07.2006, see below

07.12.2009 GB SCR15147 Allowed skip page if there were data

06.09.2006 AK SCR11820 change in spec. add task 'Calculate V.SALES12M for legal'
21.08.2006 AK SCR10393 change the update of v.SHORTAGE
17.08.2006 AK SCR10393 change use of overdrawing to overdraft/other changes
25.07.2006 SH SCR10393 Diif. bugfixing according to calculation of amount fields
12.04.2006 AK SCR10926 change access mode of tables CODE to READ
to be used for REPORT_ARCHIVE (REPA) date

back to user language if report is created

-- Get user language, uses to switch back to user language if report was produce
-- report has to be printed in GNRL_LANGUAGE
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Switch system language to GNRL_LANGUAGE, in which report has to be produced
-- Switch system language back to user language

BXA461B Print lines on the report

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select CLNT208_HGROUP, CDTO_LEGAL_ADMNO, CDTO_LEGAL_CLNTNO, CLNT110_NAME1, CLNT110_NAME2, CDTO_DATE, CDTO_ADMNO, CDTO_CLNTNO, CDTO_CURRBALINVESTMENT, CDTO_CURRBALOVERDRAWINGS, CDDT_ACTUALAMOUNTCLNT, cast((CDTO_CURRBALSETTLEMENTACC)*(-1) + CDTO_CURRBALINVESTMENT as decimal(13,2)), CDTO_CURRBALSTOCKFACILITY, CDTO_CURRBALARRANGEMENTS, CLNT204_EMP_COMM
from :1/cdto left join :1/cddt on CDDT_ADMNO=CDTO_ADMNO and CDDT_CLNTNO=CDTO_CLNTNO and CDDT_TYPE = 3 and CDDT_DATE = CDTO_DATE and CDDT_ACTUALAMOUNTCLNT<>0 join :1/clnt on CDTO_LEGAL_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CDTO_LEGAL_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO
where CDTO_DATE between ':2' and ':3'
order by
CLNT208_HGROUP, CDTO_LEGAL_ADMNO, CDTO_LEGAL_CLNTNO, CDTO_DATE, CDTO_ADMNO, CDTO_CLNTNO
for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: we print only the tesult from GNRL_DEBTORSLISTDATE the rest is only to check
page skip only from the second header and further
